alert.note: Alert for Lowlands of the Bootheel; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 10:55PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Hidalgo County through MIDNIGHT MDT... At 1053 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles north of Cotton City, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 35 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust could reduce visibilities to 3 miles or less along the I-10 corridor from Lordsburg to the Arizona state line. Locations impacted include... Lordsburg, Cotton City, Steins, Road Forks, Lordsburg Playa, Granite Gap, Pyramid Mountains and Shakespeare. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lowlands of the Bootheel; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley
